Module it.polimi.ingsw.am01
Package it.polimi.ingsw.am01.eventemitter

Class EventEmitterImpl<E extends Event>

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.am01.eventemitter.EventEmitterImpl<E>
Type Parameters:
E - the type of events that is emitted by this EventEmitter.
All Implemented Interfaces:
EventEmitter<E>
public class EventEmitterImpl<E extends Event> extends Object implements EventEmitter<E>
An implementation of EventEmitter that other classes can delegate to.

    • on

      public <T extends E> EventEmitter.Registration on(Class<T> eventClass, EventListener<T> listener)
      Registers an EventListener that will listen only to a certain type of events.
      Specified by:
      on in interface EventEmitter<E extends Event>
      Type Parameters:
      T - the type of events that the listener will listen to.
      Parameters:
      eventClass - the listener will be called only if the emitted event is an instance of this class.
      listener - the listener to be registered.
      Returns:
      a EventEmitter.Registration that can later be used to unregister this EventListener
